Function Documentation

f_checkBedOccupancy (  ) 

Function to fetch the actual occupancy list of the station in a given day Used to check whether the patient is already checked-in in the station or not globals: $s = station, $py = year, $pm = month, $pd = day, $LDDbNoLink = no db link error message $ergebnis = the resulting array from db table care_admission_patient search $new_zeile = buffer for filtered arrays db table used = nursing_station_patients
